executor:run.description: This command allows a series of SFDX commands to be scripted without the need for bash scripts (which are then not cross platform), this can automate tasks like setting up a scratch org
examples:
$ sfdx executor:run --planfile plan.json --command createScratch
  Executing Create Scratch Command...
  Executing force:org:create...
  Finished!

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

planfile.name: planfile
planfile.description: The path to the plan json file

command.name: command
command.description: The specific command that you wish to run from the plan file

arguments.name: arguments
arguments.description: An array of the elements that you wish to pass into the command being executed, the values will then be entered in by their index of the array into the number (eg $1) within the tasks in the plan file
